summary: The "Maintaining Innovation and Safe Technologies Act" (H.R. 193) directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services to issue guidance by January 1, 2027. This guidance will clarify payment rules under Medicare Part B for remote monitoring devices that incorporate artificial intelligence, such as continuous glucose monitors. The bill aims to establish a clear payment pathway for innovative health technologies that transmit patient data to providers for management and treatment, ensuring Medicare beneficiaries have access to modern, AI-driven healthcare tools.
